chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (v : term) (k x : nat), subst v k (TVar x) = subst_idx v k x

Premises:
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
subst_idx = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (v : V) (k x : nat) => match Compare_dec.lt_eq_lt_dec x k with | inleft (left _) => var x | inleft (right _) => v | inright _ => var (x - 1) end : forall V : Type, Var V -> V -> nat -> nat -> V Arguments subst_idx {V}%type_scope {H} _ (_ _)%nat_scope
subst_idx_identity : forall (v : term) (k x : nat), k = x -> subst_idx v k x = v
expand_subst : forall (v : term) (k : nat) (t : term), subst v k t = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t
subst_idx_miss_1 : forall (v : term) (k x : nat), k > x -> subst_idx v k x = var x
subst_idx_miss_2 : forall (v : term) (k x : nat), k < x -> subst_idx v k x = var (x - 1)
subst_var : forall (a : term) (k x : nat), subst a k (var x) = subst_idx a k x
lift_subst_1 : forall (t : term) (k : nat) (v : term) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t)
SubstVar_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (H1 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) (H2 : TraverseVarIsIdentity) => {| subst_var := fun (a : V) (k x : nat) => eq_ind_r (fun v : V => v = subst_idx a k x) (eq_ind_r (fun v : V => subst_idx v (0 + k) x = subst_idx a k x) eq_refl (lift_zero 0 a)) (traverse_identifies_var (fun l x0 : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 a) (l + k) x0) 0 x) |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseVarIsIdentity -> SubstVar Arguments SubstVar_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0}
lift_subst_2 : forall (t : term) (k : nat) (v : term) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)
lift_subst : forall (t : term) (k : nat) (v : term) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)
subst_subst : forall (t : term) (k : nat) (v : term) (s : nat) (w : term), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)
Build_SubstVar : forall (A : Type) (H : Var A) (H0 : Subst A A), (forall (a : A) (k x : nat), subst a k (var x) = subst_idx a k x) -> SubstVar
Record SubstVar (A : Type) (H : Var A) (H0 : Subst A A) : Prop := Build_SubstVar { subst_var : forall (a : A) (k x : nat), subst a k (var x) = subst_idx a k x } Arguments SubstVar {A}%type_scope {H H0} Arguments Build_SubstVar [A]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
subst_lift : forall (v : term) (k : nat) (t : term), subst v k (shift k t) = t
subst_idx_var : forall v k x : nat, subst_idx (var v) k x = var (subst_idx v k x)
pun_pun : forall (v : term) (w k : nat) (t : term), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)
Build_LiftSubst1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t)) -> LiftSubst1
Build_LiftSubst2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> LiftSubst2
Record LiftSubst1 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst1 { lift_subst_1 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) } Arguments LiftSubst1 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst1 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst
Record LiftSubst2 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst2 { lift_subst_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record LiftSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst { lift_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope

Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope

Build_SubstLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (V : Type) (H0 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T), subst v k (shift k t) = t) -> SubstLift
Record SubstLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (V : Type) (H0 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstLift { subst_lift : forall (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T), subst v k (shift k t) = t } Arguments SubstLift {T}%type_scope {H} {V}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_SubstLift [T]%type_scope _ [V]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
SubstSubst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) (H2 H3 : TraverseRelative) (H4 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) (H5 : TraverseVarIsIdentity) (H6 H7 : TraverseFunctorial) => {| subst_subst := fun (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V) (H8 : k <= s) => eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => t0 = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 (subst v s w)) (l + k) x) 0 (traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 (shift k v)) (l + (1 + s)) x) 0 t)) (eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => traverse (fun l x : nat => traverse (fun...
Build_PunPun : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> PunPun
TraverseRelative_term = {| traverse_relative := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (p : nat) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (fun (n m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) (H0 : m = l + p) => eq_ind_r (fun m0 : nat => traverse f m0 (TVar n) = traverse g l (TVar n)) (H l n) H0) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse...

```coq
Theorem recognize_subst_var: 
  forall (v : term) (k x : nat), subst v k (var x) = subst_idx v k x.
Proof.
  intros v k x.
  rewrite <- (expand_subst v k (var x)).
  rewrite (expand_subst v k (var x)).
  simpl.
  rewrite (pun_pun v (0 + k) k (var x)).
  rewrite (lift_subst_1 (var x) k v 0).
  rewrite (lift_subst_2 (var x) k v 0).
  rewrite (subst_idx_var v k x).
  reflexivity.
Qed.
```
